root.name: Horrid Henry
root.description: GameplayHenry is a head-strong boy, constantly raging against the tyranny of adults and infuriating girls.Henry has a range of special skills and equipment he can use during missions. His task is to dash around locations playing pranks on other characters while trying to avoid getting caught.PC System RequirementsOS: WindowsProcessor: 2 Ghz ProcessorMemory: 512 MB RAMGraphics: 128 MB Graphics CardDirectXÂ®: 9.0c or higherHard Drive: 512 MB space freeSound: DX Compatible
